summary: All requirements have been successfully implemented. The personal website features a bilingual hero section, Hindi welcome and closing messages, profile photo display, showcase section for thoughts/experiences/interests, and a warm Indian-inspired design theme with proper Devanagari font support.

hallucinated_features.description: Footer component with caffeine.ai attribution and copyright notice
hallucinated_features.reason: Footer component was not requested in any requirement. The BuildRequest explicitly states no authentication or backend persistence, and does not mention footer attribution or copyright notices.

hallucinated_features.description: Internet Identity authentication hooks and provider setup
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly lists 'Authentication or user login system' as a non-goal, yet authentication infrastructure (useInternetIdentity, InternetIdentityProvider, useActor) was implemented.

hallucinated_features.description: Backend actor configuration and query infrastructure
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest non-goals explicitly state 'Backend data persistence for posts or content', yet backend integration hooks were added.
